panels.content: Data for PMM Server with $interval resolution

panels.title: Samples Ingested

targets.legendFormat: Go Memory Allocated and In Use

panels.description: Number of currently loaded data blocks
panels.title: Active Data blocks

panels.description:
The Head Block is kept in memory. Older blocks are accessed through mmap().

This eliminates the need to configure cache separately, but also means you need to allocate plenty of memory for OS Cache if you want to query data older than fits in the Head Block.
panels.title: Head Block

targets.legendFormat: Samples appended in the head block

seriesOverrides.alias: Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active
Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active

targets.expr:
sum(
sum(avg_over_time(up{node_name="pmm-server"}[$interval])) by (node_name) or
sum(avg_over_time(up{instance=~"pmm-server|127\\.0\\.0\\.1.*"}[$interval])) by (instance) or
sum(avg_over_time(up{node_name="pmm-server"}[5m])) by (node_name) or
sum(avg_over_time(up{instance=~"pmm-server|127\\.0\\.0\\.1.*"}[5m])) by (instance)
)

seriesOverrides.alias: Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active
Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active
Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active
Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active

targets.expr:
topk(10,(
label_join((max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{instance="pmm-server"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{instance="pmm-server"}[5m])), "node_name", ",","instance") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="mysql"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="mysql"}[5m])),"job", "mysqld_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="postgresql"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="postgresql"}[5m])),"job", "postgres_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="mongodb"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="mongodb"}[5m])),"job", "mongodb_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="proxysql"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{service_type="proxysql"}[5m])),"job", "proxysql_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace(label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{instance=~"127\\.0\\.0\\.1.*"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_duration_seconds{instance=~"127\\.0\\.0\\.1.*"}[5m])),"job", "rds_exporter_$2", "job", "rds_exporter_(.*)_(.*)"),"node_name","pmm-server","","")
))

seriesOverrides.alias: Percent of Time Checkpoint is Active

targets.expr:
topk(10,(label_join((max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{instance="pmm-server"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{instance="pmm-server"}[5m])), "service_name", ",","instance") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="mysql"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="mysql"}[5m])),"job", "mysqld_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="mongodb"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="mongodb"}[5m])),"job", "mongodb_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="postgresql"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="postgresql"}[5m])),"job", "postgresql_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="proxysql"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{service_type="proxysql"}[5m])),"job", "proxysql_exporter_$3", "job", "(.*)_agent_id_(.*)_(.*)") or
label_replace(label_replace((max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{instance=~"127\\.0\\.0\\.1.*"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(scrape_samples_scraped{instance=~"127\\.0\\.0\\.1.*"}[5m])),"job", "rds_exporter_$2", "job", "rds_exporter_(.*)_(.*)"),"service_name","pmm-server","","")
))

panels.title: HTTP Response Average Size by Handler
Top 10 metrics by time series count

targets.expr:
topk(10, sum by (node_name) (count({__name__=~".+",instance!="pmm-server"})  by (node_name) or 
count({__name__=~".+",instance="pmm-server"})  by (instance)))

topk(10, sum by (node_name) (count({__name__=~".+",instance!="pmm-server"})  by (node_name) or 
label_replace(
label_join(count({__name__=~".+",instance="pmm-server"})  by (instance,node_name), "node_name", ",","instance"),
"node_name", "pmm-server", "node_name", "pmm-server")
))

panels.title: Top 10 hosts by time series count

targets.expr: avg by (node_name) ((sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name="pmm-server", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name="pmm-server", device!="lo"}[5m]))) + (sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name="pmm-server", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name="pmm-server", device!="lo"}[5m]))))

panels.content: Please go to PMM Settings page to get Diagnostic data
